document.full_text: there are thousands of names engraved on the stanley cup but jannik hansen's would represent a first if the vancouver canucks beat the boston bruins to be crowned nhl champions.
document.title: hansen a danish delight as canucks chase stanley cup
lines_and_colors: there are thousands of names engraved on the stanley cup but jannik hansen's would represent a first if the vancouver canucks beat the boston bruins to be crowned nhl champions.
